Tweet: “Morocco hasn’t actually allowed a goal in Qatar.”   No. They have. Own goals don’t happen in a vacuum. Don’t take #CanMNT’s goal away from them. Adekugbe put the ball into a dangerous spot and was rewarded.   #Qatar2022

The #AtlasLions are the most defensively disciplined team at the #Qatar2022 #FIFAWorldCup. They have not conceded a goal, in open play, from any opponent in FIVE matches. The solitary goal conceded against #Canada was an own goal. This is unprecedented for an African team.  https://t.co/9wP05CaFgS
